mapper.insert:
insert into api_nhq_gameinfo
BettingCredits,
PreCreditsPoint,
GameResult,
GameRoomName,
AgentAccount,
GamblingCode,
AfterPayoutCredits,
UserAccount,
GameType,
BettingDate,
BettingNO,
DealerName,
GameName,
SetGameNo,
IsPayout,
ParentUserID,
WinningCredits,
BettingPoint,
TableName,
TrackIP,
CreateTime,
WashCodeCredits,
UpdateTime,
BettingID,
Platformflag
#{BettingCredits},
#{PreCreditsPoint},
#{GameResult},
#{GameRoomName},
#{AgentAccount},
#{GamblingCode},
#{AfterPayoutCredits},
#{UserAccount},
#{GameType},
#{BettingDate},
#{BettingNO},
#{DealerName},
#{GameName},
#{SetGameNo},
#{IsPayout},
#{ParentUserID},
#{WinningCredits},
#{BettingPoint},
#{TableName},
#{TrackIP},
#{CreateTime},
#{WashCodeCredits},
#{UpdateTime},
#{BettingID},
#{Platformflag}
mapper.update:
update api_nhq_gameinfo
PreCreditsPoint=#{PreCreditsPoint},
GameResult=#{GameResult},
GameRoomName=#{GameRoomName},
AgentAccount=#{AgentAccount},
GamblingCode=#{GamblingCode},
AfterPayoutCredits=#{AfterPayoutCredits},
UserAccount=#{UserAccount},
GameType=#{GameType},
BettingDate=#{BettingDate},
BettingNO=#{BettingNO},
DealerName=#{DealerName},
GameName=#{GameName},
SetGameNo=#{SetGameNo},
IsPayout=#{IsPayout},
ParentUserID=#{ParentUserID},
WinningCredits=#{WinningCredits},
BettingPoint=#{BettingPoint},
TableName=#{TableName},
TrackIP=#{TrackIP},
CreateTime=#{CreateTime},
WashCodeCredits=#{WashCodeCredits},
UpdateTime=#{UpdateTime},
BettingID=#{BettingID},
Platformflag=#{Platformflag}
where BettingID=#{BettingID}
mapper.select: select * from api_nhq_gameinfo a where a.BettingID=#{key}
